thread.title: Charlotte Crosby leads the WORST dressed at the BRIT Awards 2017
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby leads the WORST dressed at the BRIT Awards 2017

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Charlotte Crosby leads the WORST dressed at the BRIT Awards 2017
text:
Charlotte Crosby leads the WORST dressed at the BRIT Awards 2017 Perrie Edwards and Ellie Goulding also missed the mark Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Charlotte Crosby lead the worst dressed as she arrived at the BRIT Awards 2017 tonight. 
The Geordie Shore star failed to impress in a sheer leopard print dress - flashing her black knickers. 
Charlotte wore her long ombre hair in tumbling mermaid waves and wore a strong brown lipstick. 
She carried a black clutch bag that matched her statement pants. Charlotte Crosby (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN) 
Perrie Edwards also missed the mark in a black feathered gown. 
The unusual dress featured a Madonna-inspired conical top. 
The gown featured a mullet-style hem flashing her toned pins and certainly set her apart from the rest of her Little Mix band mates. Little Mix (Photo: Rex Features) 
Meanwhile, Ellie Goulding also failed to impress in black. 
Her floor-length gown featured a deep slit up the front but it was the detail on the chest that steals the attention. 
The riskily slashed gown is held together by chain detailing. (Photo: Rex Features) 
Rita Ora went all out in a green jewel-encrusted gown. 
The sheer dress literally swamped the singer - tumbling in a train at her feet. 
She added a sweep of green eyeshadow and wore her hair wet so perhaps she'd made a quick dash from shower to red carpet. Rita Ora (Photo: Rex Features) 
After a slew of long gowns, Scottish singer Tallia Storm aimed to brighten up the red carpet with a mini skirt. 
But she overdid it by layering a green pinafore dress over a pink ruffled top. 
She also wore a confused tangle of necklaces over her loud ensemble. (Photo: PA)
